changes.rscadd: Added muskets, they don't need to be wound unlike puffers, and can have bayonets affixed to them for use as spears.
The Merchant can now buy a musket for a very high price.
Grenzelhoftian Mercenaries now have a choice between a Zweihander or a Musket.

changes.image: Musket and musket ramrod sprites by kyres1/@noodle_buster.
